product_name: Cannondale Pack Me Bike Vest - Women's
long_description: Carry the women's ultralight Cannondale Pack Me Vest for wind and moisture protection, just in case. 100% polyester fabric has a durable water repellent finish to help bead up light rain. Reflective accents aid visibility in low light. Packs into its own rear pocket for easy stowing in your jersey pocket or saddle bag. Cannondale Pack Me Vest for women features a semi-fitted cut that's great for running, too.
short_description: Carry the women's ultralight Cannondale Pack Me Vest for wind and moisture protection, just in case.
